titleStmt.title: Vindiciae legis, or, A vindication of the morall law and the covenants, from the errours of Papists, Arminians, Socinians, and more especially, Antinomians in XXX lectures, preached at Laurence-Jury, London / by Anthony Burgess ...
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and augmented.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Young, for Thomas Underhill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
